title: John Singleton Interview and more
itunes:title: John Singleton Interview and more
description:
Tuesday 3/28 - Are you a fan of the movies Boys in the Hood, Poetic Justice or even 2 Fast 2 Furious? Well, today on the show we had the guy that directed those movies, John Singleton stop by the show to speak to us about his new show "Rebel". Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Detective Robert Francis, and after a rumor report about the love triangle T.I is in, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners agreed or disagreed if it is OK to date while separated.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 3/28 - Are you a fan of the movies Boys in the Hood, Poetic Justice or even 2 Fast 2 Furious? Well, today on the show we had the guy that directed those movies, John Singleton stop by the show to speak to us about his new show "Rebel". Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Detective Robert Francis, and after a rumor report about the love triangle T.I is in, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners agreed or disagreed if it is OK to date while separated.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
